pages.text: Feared for their strategy, most armies would rather avoid fighting the main army of the spartans. Using the combination of a shield and spear, the hoplites are known for never losing any battle.

pages.title: Class Focus
pages.text: The hoplites belong to the $(l:classes/tank)tank$() class. This is because of their ability to use shields and spears in a perfect combination.

pages.title: Weapon Focus
pages.text: The weapon focus of the hoplites is the spear. Although difficult to use a close distance, this strong weapon work perfect in unison with a shield.

pages.title: The Spear
pages.text: When a spear is used by a hoplite, he gains +50% base damage. However there is one exception, any weapon with the enchantment 'Legendary Weapon: Spear' also gains this boost, no matter the weapon.

pages.title: Unique Ability
pages.text: The spears usage drops quickly on close ranged fights, that's where the shield comes in play. Whenever an enemy attacks the hoplite, they can quickly counterattack which gives them $(l:other/stun)Stun II$() for (time). This counter attack however has to be within (time).
